channel.title: Server
channel.description:
How do i get on the game??
ive tried using all the servers on list but they are all down
and i clicked start server but it says the same thing
how do i get on moparscape??
help me i give u 50k Real Rs coins

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go to advertisement section and look for a server with hamachi or no-ip you should figure it out then.

hopefully

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

[quote=“R Fey, post:4, topic:89882”]port??

i dont know what those are[/quote]
If you have moparscape 3.2 downloaded

Go to

[ul][li]File[/li]
[li]New Port[/li]
[li]Type in the port for the server[/li]
[li]Make sure your Server’s ip is right.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Then Download a source. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html

Then download Hamachi to get onto servers(Unless they are no-ip servers)

Hamachi here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

After thats downloaded click Create or join networks.

For creatng a network you should be the one running the server.

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
!TestScape!

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

OR

If your looking to join a server.

[ul][li]Make sure you have typed in the right IP and port[/li]
[li]Make sure if the server requires hamachi you have it downloaded and read above what to do.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
